Detailed Description

An interface into the PhysFS virtual file system library.

You have to set up PhysFS on your own before using this class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

virtual FileInfoListPtr Mangle::VFS::PhysVFS::find ( const std::string &  pattern,
bool  recursive = true,
bool  dirs = false 
) const [inline, virtual]

Find files after a given pattern. Wildcards (*) are supported. Only valid if 'hasFind' is true. Don't implement your own pattern matching here if the backend doesn't support it natively; use a filter instead.

Implements Mangle::VFS::VFS.

virtual FileInfoListPtr Mangle::VFS::PhysVFS::list ( const std::string &  dir = "",
bool  recurse = true,
bool  dirs = false 
) const [inline, virtual]

List all entries in a given directory. A blank dir should be interpreted as a the root/current directory of the archive. If dirs is true, list directories instead of files.

Implements Mangle::VFS::VFS.

virtual Stream::StreamPtr Mangle::VFS::PhysVFS::open ( const std::string &  name  )  [inline, virtual]

Open a new data stream. Deleting the object should be enough to close it.

Implements Mangle::VFS::VFS.
